snippet.title: Greedy Goblin: Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Greedy Goblin developed by Loot 'n Scoot Studios. 
Greedy Goblin is a 3D 'Looter Scooter’. Loot Legendary Artifacts and Gold while stealthily solving puzzles and outwitting your foes.
Alpha Student Game
Download Link Here: https://lootn-scoot-studios.itch.io/greedy-goblin
